name: Cheesy Squash and Zucchini Casserole
author: HALR9000
summary: This cheesy dish is a favorite of our Thanksgiving dinner.
ingredients: ½ cup biscuit baking mix (such as Bisquick®)
10  saltine crackers, or as needed, crushed
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Fill a large pot with water and bring to a rolling boil
Add yellow squash, zucchini, and onion; bring back to a boil, and cook vegetables until tender, about 15 minutes
Drain and transfer vegetables to a large bowl
Mix Cheddar cheese, baking mix, butter, eggs, sugar, and salt with the cooked vegetables using a large spoon; stir until butter has melted and baking mix has dissolved
Fold crushed crackers into the mixture until the liquid has been absorbed
Pour mixture into a 1 1/2-quart casserole dish; top with bread crumbs
Bake in the preheated oven until topping is lightly browned and cheese is melted, 30 minutes
